abstract: Victoria Azarenka beats Svetlana Kuznetsova to win her third Miami Open title in Key Biscayne, Fla, becoming third woman after Steffi Graf and Kim Clijsters to win back-to-back tournaments at Indian Wells, Calif, and Key Biscayne in the same year.
lead_paragraph: Azarenka struggled with her serve but captured her third title at the event, becoming the third woman to win back-to-back titles at Indian Wells and Key Biscayne.

headline.print_headline: Miami Title Completes a Rare Feat by Azarenka
headline.main: Victoria Azarenka Wins Miami Open, Completing a Rare Feat

snippet: Azarenka struggled with her serve but captured her third title at the event, becoming the third woman to win back-to-back titles at Indian Wells and Key Biscayne....
